Validation.Username-message: Username must contain letters and end with a number without spaces
Validation.country-message: Country must contain only letters and spaces
Validation.Phone-message: Please enter a valid phone number in the format (123) 456-7890
Validation.Password-message: Password must be at least 6 characters and include letters, numbers, and special characters
Validation.confirmPassword-message: confirmPassword must be at least 6 characters and include letters, numbers, and special characters
Validation.Password-hasLowerCase: Must include at least one lowercase letter.
Validation.Password-hasUpperCase: Must include at least one uppercase letter.
Validation.Password-hasNumber: Must include at least one digit.
Validation.Password-hasSpecialChar: Must include at least one special character.
Validation.Password-minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
